abstract: Poland's Deputy Culture Min Piotr Zuchowski believes legendary 'Nazi treasure train' exists, lending support to claims of its recent discovery by two men; German train laden with gold, jewels and guns is said to have disappeared under Soviet pursuit in 1945.
lead_paragraph: A leading Polish cultural official said he was convinced of the existence of a Nazi treasure train that has been missing and that two men claimed to have found recently.

headline.main: Poland: A Warning for Treasure Hunters
headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: A Warning for Treasure Hunters

snippet: A leading Polish cultural official said he was convinced of the existence of a Nazi treasure train that has been missing and that two men claimed to have found recently.
